    • Method Detail

      • buildContractWithValue

        public Contract buildContractWithValue(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                       @NonNull Decimal value)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Join this contract with other (split when the sum of contracts is greater) or split the current one to have the input value in the one contract.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - is name of field for split or join
        value - is value to have in a one contract
        Returns:
        built Contract
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if something went wrong
